scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on their predicted churn probability, potentially leading to targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Assess the vulnerability of the customer churn prediction model to model inversion attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  The churn prediction model uses anonymized but potentially re-identifiable customer data (age range, income bracket, transaction history patterns) to predict customer churn probability for a major retail bank.
